Name: Fossil fuel CO2 emissions
Comments: CDAIC - Note King et al. 2014 BGD ; note 1796 in SOCCR 2007 table II.2 pp. 61 for year 2002 (average of 3 different reported  estimates)

Name: ∆C
Comments: King et al. 2014 BGD ; Changes in terrritorial C stocks (  including ecosystem C pool and product pool changes ) "atm flow method" ( Table 1 )

Name: NEE
Comments: Mass balance : Change of territorial C stocks +  lateral exports

Name: Land use change
Uncert Comments: From SOCCR reported uncertainty on each term converted from 95% CI to 1 sigma by dividing by two
Comments: SOCCR 2007 ( LUC is defined by the sum of agriculuiral soil C balance + woody encroachement in Table ES.I pp. 6)

Name: NPP
Uncert Comments: 10% from Hicke et al. two estimates
Comments: Hicke et al. GRL 2002 average of the period 1982-1998 (from AVHRR NDVI and CASA model)

Name: Fire
Comments: Turner et al. GCB 2012 for year 2004

Name: Wood product decay
Comments: SOCCR 2007 p91 (defined from landfills wood products emissions - includes emisions as CH4 and no data from Mexico) - note : inconsistent with  production (SOCCR p110) -export - wood product storage change (King pers. Com - email 2013) = 128 - 61 - 68 = -1 Tg C ; note a forest harvest removal of 165 TgC y-1  (Hayes et al. Table 6.6)

Name: Crop product consumption
Comments: SOCCR 2007 p88 for crop production (217) minus SOCCR2007 crop trade net export (35)

Name: Crop export
Comments: SOCCR2007 crop trade net export (35) ; Note Peters has 38.4 Tg C yr-1

Name: Soil C export to rivers
Comments: Mass balance =  outgas + export to ocean (ignoring burial) ; note  SOCCR 2007 p 36 reports burial = 20 Tg yr-1

Name: Bedrock C export to rivers
Comments: Mass balance =  outgas + export to ocean (ignoring burial) ; note  SOCCR 2007 p 36 reports burial = 20 Tg yr-1

Name: River export to ocean
Comments: GLOBALNEWS for DOC & POC (i.e. Mayorga et al., 2010) and Hartmann et al., 2009 for DIC ; note 35 TgC yr-1 US only in SOCCR  p33 Table 3.2 with no data for Canada and Mexico ;
